message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.SY

This paper proposes a method for uncertainty-aware neural networks for regression using Bayesian linear regression on the representation from the last hidden layer. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The method is benchmarked on standard datasets, which suggests that it could also belong to the sub-category of Computer Vision (cs.CV). Additionally, the method is evaluated as an uncertainty-aware model in model-based reinforcement learning, which suggests that it could belong to the sub-categories of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) and Systems and Control (cs.SY).
